equivalent to {{af|enm|ende|-en}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|enm|/ˈɛːndən/|/ˈɛndən/}} ===Verb=== {{head|enm|verb}} # To come to an [[end]], [[stop]], or [[termination]] {{gloss|usually of a era or event}} ## To suffer [[death]]; to [[pass away]]; to [[die]]. ## Of literary works; to end, to have no more chapters or pages. ## {{lb|enm|rare|Late ME}} To be [[suffixed]] or [[inflected]]. # To complete or accomplish; to reach completion: ## To construct or erect an edifice or structure. ## To stop recounting a narrative. # To cause a behaviour, consequence, or effect. # To have a border, margin, or terminus. # {{lb|enm|religion}} To rule or have ultimate power; to realise. # {{lb|enm|rare}} To [[end]], [[finish]], or [[terminate]] {{gloss|usually of a era or event}} # {{lb|enm|rare|philosophy}} To be ended; to be finite or limited. # {{lb|enm|rare|Late ME}} To vanquish;
